column2: "Ahyɛse no Nyankopɔn bɔɔ sor nye asaase."
"Nna asaase da hɔ pan a onnyi bɔbea biara; na isum agye bun no enyi: na Nyankopɔn no sunsum butuw nsu no enyi"
column3: "#1.2 BUTUW NSU … ENYI: Mfonyi a Hibriw no rutwa no tse dɛ akokɔbaatan a obutuw ne nkyirefuwa do rohwɛ dɛ ɔbɛdan mba atseasefo a."
Ekan mbra: na ekan bae."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn hun kan no dɛ oye: na Nyankopɔn tseew kan no fii sum no ho."

column3: na isum no Adzesaa. Na adze sae na adze kyee
column4: da a odzi kan nye no."

column3: Wɔmma wimu mbra nsu no finimfin
column4: na wɔmma ɔntsew nsu no mu ebien: na ɔyɛɛ dɛm."

column3: na ɔtseew nsu a ɔwɔ wimu no n'ase no fii nsu a ɔwɔ wimu no no sor no ho."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn frɛɛ wimu no ɔsor. Na adze sae na adze kyee
column3: da a otsia ebien nye no."
Wɔmma nsu a ɔwɔ sor n'ase no mpra nkɔboa fakor na wɔmma wewewdo nyi noho: na ɔyɛɛ dɛm."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn frɛɛ wewewdo no Asaase; na nsu no no mboano no ɔfrɛɛ no Epo: na Nyankopɔn hun dɛ oye."

column3: Asaase mfifir efuw
column5: na ndua a wɔsow nduaba dɛ mbrɛ hɔn su tse
column6: wɔ asaase do: na ɔyɛɛ dɛm."

column3: haban a ɔsow aba dɛ mbrɛ no su tse: na Nyankopɔn hun dɛ oye."
da a otsia ebiasa nye no."
Nkandzea mbra wimu mbeyi adzekyee mfi adzesaa ho: na ɔnyɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze

column2: "na ɔnyɛ nkandzea wɔ wimu nhyerɛn asaase do: na ɔyɛɛ dɛm."
"Na Nyankopɔn yɛɛ nkandzea akɛse ebien; kandzea kɛse no dɛ ɔnhwɛ adzekyee do
column3: na kakraba no dɛ ɔnhwɛ adzesaa do: na ɔyɛɛ nworaba so."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn dze sisii wimu dɛ wɔnhyerɛn asaase do
column5: na wonyi kan mfi sum ho: na Nyankopɔn hun dɛ oye."

column3: da a otsia anan nye no."
Nsu no mu mbra mbowa ahorow pii na ntumbowa so nkyin asaase do wɔ sor."
nkakramba na ahorow pii
column5: na ntumbowa nyinara dɛ mbrɛ hɔn su tsetsee: na Nyankopɔn hun dɛ oye."

column3: Hom nwo
column5: na hom nhyɛ po mu nsu mu ma
column6: na ntumbowa ndɔr wɔ asaase do."

column3: da a otsia enum nye no."
Asaase ndɔr mbowa a nkwa wɔ hɔn mu dɛ mbrɛ hɔn su tsetsee
column6: nye asaase mbowadoma dɛ mbrɛ hɔn su tsetsee: na ɔyɛɛ dɛm."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn yɛɛ asaase do mbowadoma dɛ mbrɛ hɔn su tsetsee
column3: na Nyankopɔn hun dɛ oye."
Wɔmma yɛnyɛ nyimpa wɔ hɛn su do
column4: wɔ hɛn saso do: na wonya tum wɔ po mu nam
column7: nye mbowa a wɔwea asaase do nyinara."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn bɔɔ nyimpa wɔ nankasa no su do
column3: Nyew
column4: Nyankopɔn no su do na ɔbɔɔ nyimpa; ɔbɔɔ hɔn ɔbanyin nye ɔbaa."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn hyiraa hɔn: na Ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom nwo
column6: na hom ndzi do tum. Hom nya tum wɔ po mu nam do
column8: nye asaase do mbowa nyinara do."

column3: Hwɛ
column4: mama hom nduadzewa na nduaba a ɔwɔ asaase nyinara enyi

column2: "na asaase do mbowadoma nyinara nye wimu ntumbowa nyinara dze
column3: mama hɔn sar na nhaban nhaban dɛ wondzi: na ɔyɛɛ dɛm."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn hun adze a ɔayɛ nyinara
column3: na hwɛ
column4: odzi mu papaapa. Na adze sae na adzekyee
column5: da a otsia esia nye no."
